title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Additional Valentineâ€™s Day Clothing
content:
There are more ways to coordinate outfits during this season of peak romance:

- Lend a helping hand by enlisting as an Associate or Bodyguard to land the Valentines Blazer
- Win any 2 Adversary Modes through February 19 to complete the Weekly Challenge and receive the Pink Heart Shades, in addition to the usual GTA$100,000 bonus
